casebody.data:
BOYD
v.
KINGDOM TRUST CO. 2017-1336 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Certified Question of State Law, United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit, No. 17-3026. On respondent's motion for leave to file response to amicus brief. Motion granted. The response attached to respondent's motion is deemed filed.
